mapper.insert: MERGE INTO schedule USING dual ON (s_name = #{sName} and #{sStarttime}=s_starttime and #{sArrtime}=s_arrtime) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (s_name, a_depnm, a_arrnm, al_name, s_starttime, s_arrtime, s_person, s_price) VALUES (#{sName}, #{aDepnm}, #{aArrnm}, #{alName}, #{sStarttime}, #{sArrtime}, #{sPerson}, #{sPrice})
